alert.note: Alert for Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bath, Greenbrier and northern Summers Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Marlinton to Dry Creek. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewisburg... Hinton... Ronceverte... Rainelle... Alderson... Rupert... and Quinwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern West Virginia.
